pageContent: Purpose: To evaluate the performance of [68Ga]Ga-PSMA-11 PET/CT in the diagnosis of recurrent prostate cancer (PC) after prostatectomy in a large multicentre cohort.

metaData.source:
A 10-year clinical experience with intermittent hormonal therapy for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12600425/
